title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message:
Hi guys,

820-01700 was LD near left hinge (as seen normally) and it is missing  pp3v3_s5 but line has a diode mode of 0.330

The issue seems identical to this thread: [URL]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/820-01700-20v-0-03-amps.61049/[/URL]

Other voltages look good and board is very clean.

Any ideas? Haven't tried DFU mode yet..

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message:
Not similar problem, as you don't have short on 3V3_S5 rail.

"Other voltages look good"
Do you mean all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages present?
If yes, try to access it in DFU mode.

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message: I flashed it in DFU choosing restore and it came back to life but internet recovery gives error 2003 and the laptop apparently is locked for USB booting.. any suggestions?

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message:
Try some of the tips Google search brings up
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.google.com/search?q=macbook+internet+recovery+error+2003&client=firefox-b-d&hl=es&source=lnms&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjNtoH7vJLzAhUkRvEDHW-6DEQQ_AUIcCgA&biw=1408&bih=615&dpr=1.36[/URL]
Start with this:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://softwaretested.com/mac/how-to-resolve-error-code-2003f-on-mac/[/URL]
on bottom page.

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message: ok thanks! Il check it out although I think its trolling me as I tried again earlier and got error 2002f... is this different? apologies for the bombardment of questions.

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message: ok I managed to install big sur by connecting to a different WiFi and I had to issue Terminal commands to start the installation from USB as the recovery procedure hanged. All good now.

title: 820-01700 LD -> 20v / 0.045a
message:
Thanks for solution feedback.
I'm pretty sure this can help other members in the future.
